title: Girnar
summary: Girnar is an ancient hill in Junagadh, Gujarat, India. It is one of the Holiest places (Shashwat Tirth) for Jains, where the 22nd Tirthankar, Lord Neminath attained nirvana. It is also believed to be place where next 24 Tirthankars will attain nirvana in future. The mountain is also an abode of some Hindu temples.
